title: Voices
desc:
Post 1129
- This is played in your identity area
- This card can also be played if a player played multiple cards at the same time, even if it is not your turn
- On your turn, the host will give you three non-card specific rules
- You may play any card you want, as long as it follows the rules, one card must be able to be played
- If you choose an invalid card, the card is not played and your turn is skipped
- If there are no valid card, you may place two cards, you may not get to 1 card like this
